TextBlock.Text: AZOLLA: Sennetti, have you had any luck asking the Dree how to leave the <color=purple>Deep Bramble</color>?
SENNETTI: I have asked many people about how to leave, but so far they all seem certain that escape is impossible.
OKALIS: I am sorry to report my investigations have not uncovered an escape. I have scoured <color=orange>Briar’s Hollow</color>, but have been thoroughly unable to find any new passageways.

AZOLLA: This is troubling news. If we are unable to locate an exit, we will not be capable of reuniting with the rest of our clan or locating the <color=orange>Eye of the Universe</color>. We should all continue searching for an exit. I refuse to believe we are entirely ensnared by the <color=purple>Bramble</color>.
NESIA: That is... troubling. Suppose they simply haven’t found a suitable exit yet?
SENNETTI: I find that to be very unlikely. The Dree have been here for thousands of years, the idea they would overlook an exit for that long is improbable.
